page.title: 12Entertainment in Morecambe.
page.content: One of the best arcades in Morecambe is on the Pier. It has fruit machines and arcade games as well as some pool tables. At the end of the Pier there are facilities for roller skating and open-air dancing. The Pleasure Park is at the West End of Morecambe. It has lots of rides like the Log Flume and Cyclone. Happy Mount Park has lots of gardens and games. The games include trampolining, pitch and putt and tennis. Old people like to go there to walk in the gardens and watch the games. Morecambe does not have a cinema now because it was closed down in 1984. The nearest cinema is now in Lancaster. Many people enjoy going to Bingo and there are many clubs that cater for this in Morecambe. The biggest is The Granada which was opened recently by Larry Grayson.
